post.body: now that you've seen Emile Hirsch as Speed Racer (so kickass BTW), watch Alpha Dog and ask yourself "is that the same actor?"
Christmas #2 happens today with more feasting, I'm making shepherd's pie and pumpkin crunch cake, my Santa suit is a hysterical success
did I forget to tell you that I really REALLY hate snow?
today I'm making a cola-infused ham with sweet mustard glaze, string beans with bacon, cheesy potatoes and 10-grain bread... lookout!
stuck in more snow than I care to relate... I'm afraid the cabin fever may make me go all REDRUM on the family
I'm making a Santa costume and baking about 16 dozen cookies this weekend
